coreAttributes.name: Sugar Cookie
coreAttributes.description: An individually-wrapped sugar cookie, which is covered in white icing and multi-coloured sprinkles. Although the icon on the package is of a reindeer-morph, it is declared to be safe to eat for all races.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot stronger...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 3)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unwrap)] the Sugar Cookie from its protective packaging and [npc.verb(pop)] it into [npc.her] mouth. Although it looked normal enough, [npc.she] soon [npc.verb(discover)] that the taste is anything but, as it's somehow both extremely sweet and salty at the same time. Despite the unusual combination of flavours, it's tasty enough, and [npc.she] soon [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] having eaten the whole cookie.
